attributes.action: Conduct a referendum on whether we should stay in the European Economic Area.
attributes.additional_details: The European Economic Area (EEA) provides for the free movement of persons, goods, services and capital within the internal market of the European Union (EU) between its 28 member states, as well as three of the four member states of the European Free Trade Association (EFTA): Iceland, Liechtenstein and Norway.
attributes.background: The recent referendum has mandated leaving the EU but not the EEA.  it would be good to take the fully democratic route and to let the people decide.
